script:
1). Why can't I access the Internet?
Yes, I can access it.
I'll ask him when he gets back.
The server's been down all morning. 
2). Excuse me, where would I find Ms. Clark's office, please?
It's on the 11th floor. 
She's away from her desk right now.
Take the elevator, around the corner.
3). Is it possible to expedite delivery of this package?
No, I couldn't be able to do that.
Yes it is, for an extra fee. 
Yes I would if I were you.
